titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a limitation on use of claim sampling to deny claims or recover overpayments under medicare.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2486)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/5/1993--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the use of claim sampling to deny claims or recover overpayments under Medicare except when fraud has been determined, in which case claim sampling may be used for the purpose of assessing civil monetary penalties.
